  • public final class PngConverter
extends ImageConverter
    Class responsable to convert PNG files to PDF.

    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com

      • getImage

        public com.lowagie.text.Image getImage()
                                throws com.lowagie.text.BadElementException,
                                       java.net.MalformedURLException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Returns an image from bytes. The bytes is loaded during the conversion process and must be used to create the image.
        Returns:
        Image which represents the bytes
        Throws:
        com.lowagie.text.BadElementException - BadElementException
        java.net.MalformedURLException - MalformedURLException
        java.io.IOException - IOException
